column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is a hoppin' place
column4: it IS a BBQ joint after all)
column5: comfortable and lively.  If you come during the rush
column6: be prepared to wait a few minutes and to vie for a table.  You'll probably get to meet one of the owners if you choose to eat in--one of them was making the rounds
column7: chatting up his customers and making sure everyone was happy.  Go now before it's even more packed
column8: thanks to its mention in this month's issue of Gourmet...  I can't wait to head back for some St. Louis-style ribs.  And more cobbler. :)
